events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit at all. I'd like to request a refund or exchange for a different size as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to size mismatch and potential exchange inquiry.
The refund specialist agent has been assigned to handle the customer's case regarding the sizing problem and refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you'd like a refund or exchange for the jacket you purchased. I'm here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the item has been worn or washed? This will help us to process your refund or exchange quickly.
My order number is 8793452. The jacket is brand new; I tried it on once but didn't wear it outside. No tags are removed.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate a full refund upon return of the jacket. I'll send you a prepaid shipping label so you can send the item back at no cost.
Thanks, that sounds good to me. I appreciate the prepaid label offer and will send the jacket back tomorrow.
The return process has been initiated and a shipping label sent. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just following up to confirm that you have shipped back the jacket and to check if you need any further assistance from us.
Yes, I shipped it on the 16th and I received the refund today. Thank you very much for the smooth process.
We're glad everything went smoothly and your refund was received. Closing this case now but feel free to contact us anytime.
